memoise 2.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Forget past results. Resets the cache of a memoised function. Use drop_cache to reset the cache only for particular arguments.

Source: R/memoise.R
forget.Rd

Forget past results. Resets the cache of a memoised function. Use drop_cache to reset the cache only for particular arguments.

forget(f)

Arguments

f

memoised function

See also

memoise, is.memoised, drop_cache

Examples

memX <- memoise(function() { Sys.sleep(1); runif(1) })
# The forget() function
system.time(print(memX()))

#> [1] 0.08075014
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.001   0.000   1.003 
system.time(print(memX()))

#> [1] 0.08075014
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.001   0.000   0.000 
forget(memX)

#> [1] TRUE
system.time(print(memX()))

#> [1] 0.834333
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   0.000   0.000   1.047
